overview:
An investment professional and entrepreneur, Yevgen has been the driving force behind the new venture capital at AVentures Capital.

In 2011, he co-founded DashBoard Systems, a software startup. From 2008 to 2010, he was a Vice President at ICON Private Equity, one of the leading private equity funds in Russia and Ukraine. At ICON, Yevgen was responsible for the fundâ€™s deal flow and portfolio management. Previously, as an investment banker at Concorde Capital and co-founder of his own investment boutique, he originated and executed transactions in Ukraine and Russia with a total value in excess of US$250M.

Yevgen holds an MBA degree with distinction from INSEAD (Singapore and France). He studied Mathematics & Economics at Wolfgang Goethe University (Germany), Brandenburg Technical University (Germany) and Dnepropetrovsk National University (Ukraine).

Yevgen is fluent in English, German, Russian and Ukrainian and speaks conversational Spanish.
